resources.string: Made the app. Likes bagels a lot.
Made the app\'s icon. Probably also likes bagels a lot, but I haven\'t asked him so I don\'t know.
Press the check mark to select a bagel to use.
Set Bagels as your home screen wallpaper to use it!

string-array.name: messages
string-array.item: KMZ did it first.
I have a strange attraction to bagels.
The bagel approves of nobody.
I definitely didn\'t re-use this icon from an unpublished app.
The purple mini-FABs are attacking!
Gotten any java.lang.OutOfMemoryErrors yet?
Using this alongside Status is completely bugless and perfectly healthy for your phone.
Phil probably likes PHP.
Go eat a bagel, Akshath.
There should be a new update by now.
You should probably request a feature that already exists.
This message would really confuse some people if they saw this message.
I posted so many teasers about this. You missed all of them.
Did you hear about the guy whose whole left side was cut off? He\'s all right now.
I\'d tell you a chemistry joke but I know I wouldn\'t get a reaction.
Yesterday I accidentally swallowed some food coloring. The doctor says I\'m OK, but I feel like I died a little inside.
Have you ever tried to eat a clock? It\'s very time consuming.
I used to be a banker but I lost interest.
I once heard a joke about amnesia, but I forgot how it goes.
I used to have a fear of hurdles, but I got over it.
Don\'t trust people that do acupuncture, they\'re back stabbers.
I used to be addicted to soap, but I\'m clean now.
When a clock is hungry it goes back four seconds.
The magician got so mad he pulled his hare out.
I took a picture of a field of wheat, it was grainy.
My tailor is happy to make a pair of pants for me, or at least sew it seams.
I was struggling to figure out how lightning works then it struck me.
My grade in Marine Biology is below sea-level.
I don\'t think I need a spine. It\'s holding me back.

item.p: \nGlide is a fast and efficient open source media management and image loading framework for Android that wraps media decoding, memory and disk caching, and resource pooling into a simple and easy to use interface.
\nField and method binding for Android views which uses annotation processing to generate boilerplate code for you.
